attributes.action: Government to support business and population of uk through funding every adult
attributes.additional_details: The cost of this based on 56,000.000 adult at 10k each 5,600,000.000 (5.6 billion) nothing in the broad sense as will cause millions of people to be made redundant. And billions in tax/ Vat payments lost
attributes.background: Financial help every UK adult, by means of a £10,000 paid to each adult with a UK tax code this could be done via business or direct into bank accounts this means all adults will be able to pay all bills over next 6/8 weeks means all business that are able to survive will survive.
